content: I’m so sorry I left you hanging with the dog! I wasn’t clear about that at all. When I had my little dog, she was crate trained. She went straight to her crate every night without any prompting. The first thing I did every morning was let her out and give her a treat so in my mind that is what I was doing. She went out to do her business but was always right next to me otherwise. I didn’t follow up on that in the story, but I promise you she wasn’t forgotten outside. She wouldn’t have stood for it! :)
